it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.authentication

Class GBAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.authentication.GBAuth

  • public class GBAuth
extends java.lang.Object
    The object of this class contains the credentials of a GoBoxAccount. To use any of the API of this package you need this object. GBAuth also provides the necessary methods to talk with the server to check the data. Created on 31/12/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  GBAuth.Modality
      Type of session: client or storage mode

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String password)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Try to login with the information set. This method will block the thread until the login is complete.
        Returns:
        true if the user is logged, false if the credentials aren't valid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Network error

      • check

        public boolean check()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Check if the token of the object is valid. This method block the thread until the response from the server is retrieved.
        Returns:
        true if the token is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Network errors

      • addOnTokenChangeListener

        public void addOnTokenChangeListener(java.lang.Runnable listener)
        Add a new listener that will be called when the auth token change. You can you this to update your account information
